body: i'm thankful that though i had one of those nights of sleep where your bad dreams feel so real that you start to believe them and can't find the border between dream and reality, eventually i woke up and it was morning and time for breakfast and as i ate my bowl of cinnamon life cereal and read the news on my phone, i knew they weren't real.
normalized_markdown: i'm thankful that though i had one of those nights of sleep where your bad dreams feel so real that you start to believe them and can't find the border between dream and reality, eventually i woke up and it was morning and time for breakfast and as i ate my bowl of cinnamon life cereal and read the news on my phone, i knew they weren't real.
